meanings.definition: A surgical procedure in which an incision is made in the abdominal wall to gain access to the abdominal cavity.
meanings.sent1: During the laparotomies, the doctors carefully cut the abdomen to reach inside.
meanings.sent2: The hospital performed multiple laparotomies last week to treat various conditions.
meanings.sent3: The laparotomies seemed like a magic trick as the doctors reached into the belly through a small cut.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity led her to imagine laparotomies as secret doors to the hidden world inside the body.
meanings.sent5: The vivid memory of the laparotomies stayed with him, reminding him of the delicate surgery.
